type: Legendary Creature – Human Knight Lord Noble
rules_text:
Vigilance
[i]Three Hopes[/i] – When Dimitri enters, support 3. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to three other target creatures.)[/i]
[i]Breaker of Forces[/i] – At the beginning of combat on your turn,, you may return a creature you control to its owner's hand. If you do, creatures you control gain first strike and get +1/+1 until end of turn.
